structure.comment: Allows you to subscribe to changes to the instance that interest you For the best experience: restrict the cdm instance and inject the correct type. This can be the full cdm, but most likely its a partial view.
structure.name: pipeline

structure.comment: The full cdm instance as it is now
structure.name: cdmInstance

field.comment: Some or all of the data was rejected
field.name: rejected

structure.comment: The relations of this cdm instance. These should be ALL currently active relations. If an existing relation is no longer listed, it is removed.
structure.name: relations
